EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_GPvsRedshift_WP_Q117.Confirmation - GPvsRedshift
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Pivotal Greenplum vs Amazon Redshift white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Pivotal Greenplum vs Amazon Redshift white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]> - Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]> - Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]> - Demo: Running Teradata Client Applications on Greenplum with Hyper-Q <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KS9_AlCvgiI&t=7s]]> - Learn More: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]> - Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
